channel.title: Torva recolor frosty cache editor
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I have seen people requesting for torva recolor. here is how to do: Open up frosty cache editor. run the jar or run.bat if you don't have frosty cache editor download it from here: [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/514213-latest-greatest-cache-editor.html"]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/514213-latest-greatest-cache-editor.html[/URL]
[CODE]Old colors Torva Helm: 36903 42016 36912 36929 36917 36908 42002 41987 36895 36904 36921 36871 36924 36882 36880 36916 36877 36885 36906 36890 36935 36881 36888 36884 38931 36899 36896 36918 36889 36925 36922 36907 36911 36927 41995 36930 36891 36879 36913 36875 36886 36879 36913 36875 36886 36897 36902 36920 36900
Torva body: 71 48537 48183 48531 48138 48156 48146 48150 48649 48147 48132 525 529 533 48658 48654 48158 48398 48141 48142 48172 48136 520 43018 48143 48652 48666 48162 43016 43023 43021 53 43020 43042 43012 43024 43032 43038 43063 43034 43054 43050 48392 57 48182 43027 43029 48131 43031 43017 48135 43051 43045 36886 36883 36900 36913 36902 36918 36892 36878 36876 36882 48128 48171 54870 36898 36887 48152 36904 65 36899 36894 54823 36881 36925 36895 torva legs: 48138 48266 48132 48534 48280 48528 3468 43073 48134 43268 43272 43270 43280 43282 43266 43264 68 48532 60 71 48536 48540 48546 48539 48535 48530 48531 48146 48136 37002 48154 48160 37006 48162 48178 37014 51 56 65 36876 36874 36872 69 53 48145 36882 48151 48542 75 [/CODE] 1 - load the cache [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QRO2WqC.png[/img] 2 [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U6QB3I4.png[/img] 3 find for torva fastest way to do is typing : 20137 [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/n8ERz3Z.png[/img] 4 once u clicked edit u see this [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qM0yZow.png[/img] 5 go to options and u will see model colors [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o1zryGK.png[/img] 6. if u changed save the file ofcourse: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DiCek2M.png[/img]
how to edit it in cache editor: 36903=Yourcolorhere;42016=Yourcolorhere;36912=Yourcolorhere;36929=Yourcolorhere;36917=Yourcolorhere;36908=Yourcolorhere;42002=Yourcolorhere;41987=Yourcolorhere;36895=Yourcolorhere;36904=Yourcolorhere;36921=Yourcolorhere;36871=Yourcolorhere;36924=Yourcolorhere;36882=Yourcolorhere;36880=Yourcolorhere;36916=Yourcolorhere;36877=Yourcolorhere;36885=Yourcolorhere;36906=Yourcolorhere;36890=Yourcolorhere;36935=Yourcolorhere;36881=Yourcolorhere;36888=Yourcolorhere;36884=Yourcolorhere;38931=Yourcolorhere;36899=Yourcolorhere;36896=Yourcolorhere;36918=Yourcolorhere;36889=Yourcolorhere;36925=Yourcolorhere;36922=Yourcolorhere;36907=Yourcolorhere;36911=Yourcolorhere;36927=Yourcolorhere;41995=Yourcolorhere;36930=Yourcolorhere;36891=Yourcolorhere;36879=Yourcolorhere;36913=Yourcolorhere;36875=Yourcolorhere;36886=Yourcolorhere;36879=Yourcolorhere;36913=Yourcolorhere;36875=Yourcolorhere;36886=Yourcolorhere;36897=Yourcolorhere;36902=Yourcolorhere;36920=Yourcolorhere;36900=Yourcolorhere;
